actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States Postal Service and the Postal Rate Commission should take such action as may be necessary to establish a special citizen's rate of not greater than 15 cents per ounce for domestic, nonbusiness first-class mail.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United States Postal Service and the Postal Rate Commission should establish a special citizen's rate of not more than 15 cents per ounce for domestic, nonbusiness first-class mail.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States Postal Service and the Postal Rate Commission should take such action as may be necessary to establish a special citizen's rate of not greater than 15 cents per ounce for domestic, nonbusiness first-class mail.
